Title: Wanted
Overview: Doormat Wesley Gibson discovers that his recently murdered father - who Wesley never knew - belonged to a secret guild of assassins. After a leather-clad sexpot drafts Wesley into the society, he hones his innate killing skills and turns avenger.
Keywords: assassin, loss of father, secret society, mission of murder, revenge
production_companies: Universal Pictures, Spyglass Entertainment, Bazelevs Production, Kickstart Productions, Marc Platt Productions, Top Cow Productions, Relativity Media, Ringerike Zweite Filmproduktion, Revolution Sun Studios
Cast: Angelina Jolie, James McAvoy, Morgan Freeman
